message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and rarity.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the item. However, I believe I can find similar products at a lower price. I am willing to pay $8000 for this product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10500. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value and rarity.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I still believe we can reach a more equitable solution. I am willing to pay $9500 for this product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $9500, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $10000 for this product.
